title: Linklogis Empowers Inclusive Finance and Builds Data Security Fortification with ESG Mindset - Yahoo Finance
content: Linklogis Empowers Inclusive Finance and Builds Data Security Fortification with ESG Mindset  Yahoo Finance
description: On May 19, 2022, Linklogis unveiled its first Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) report since the company was listed in 2021, which is also the first ESG report released by a listed supply chain finance technology SaaS enterprise in China.
